articles.title: 11 people stabbed at Walmart in Traverse City, Michigan
articles.description: A mass stabbing at a Walmart in Traverse City, Michigan, resulted in 11 people being injured, with the suspect currently in custody.

articles.title: 6 dead, 1 injured in crash on I-485 in Charlotte
articles.description: A tragic crash on I-485 in Charlotte led to six fatalities and one injury.

articles.title: UN urges restraint as Thailand-Cambodia clashes displace thousands; Security Council meets
articles.description: The UN Secretary-General has urged "utmost restraint" amid intensifying border clashes between Thailand and Cambodia, as the Security Council convened to address the situation.
